Posts.Content: Dear Annie H I just found all communications from Macmillan in my junk mail!!!! Thank you for your lovely message. I hope you have good weather on your holiday. I am off to Cyprus in the early hours of Saturday and will be gone for 17 days. The memorial service for my husband will be next Sunday so I am going to try and enjoy the rest of the time. It will be with all my in-laws who I love to see.
Posts.Title: Increaseed risk of cancer in other breast -why?

Posts.Content: Mine still comes into my junk mail. I know the memorial will go well thanks Anne.Love and hugs to you too.Â
Posts.Title: Increaseed risk of cancer in other breast -why?

Posts.Content: I think you should get your check or the worry will ruin your holiday anyway. I can imagine you now getting the good news and having a lovely holiday feeling such relief. xxx
Posts.Title: Increaseed risk of cancer in other breast -why?

Posts.Content: Annie I do hope that everything will be ok for you. I had my breast cancer years ago and still sometimes I worry it will be back in the other breast. I haven't even been taking my own advice since my husband died of secondary cancer 2 years ago. I have become a bit paranoid about going near doctors. Will your husband be able to go with you to your appointment? Hugs from me xxxxx
Posts.Title: Increaseed risk of cancer in other breast -why?
